snippet.title: We Stay Behind - Official Story Trailer | Games Baked in Germany Showcase
snippet.description:
We Stay Behind is a single-player third-person mystery between dreams and reality. A comet is on course to obliterate the small town of Laburnum Creek. Renowned writer Laura Tanner visits the former health resort to interview several inhabitants who are refusing to leave. But there’s something rotten at the heart of this picturesque town. Curious characters and surreal encounters await Laura in an enigmatic journey between dreams and reality. Will Laburnum Creek cast its spell over her too? Or will she jeopardize everything to uncover the truth?

We Stay Behind is coming soon to PC (Steam) with a new demo available now. Visit Steam and add it to your wishlist now:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1142570/We_Stay_Behind/
